name: Zig Zag Vase M
description: The Zig Zag Vase Medium is a fun accent piece with its bold pattern. Available in a Large size. Currently made to order 5-6 weeks. Handmade Shagreen/Pen Shell, bronze-patina brass. All interior of KIFU PARIS vases can support water. Wipe clean with soft dry cloth. Made in Philippines. Although inspired by her parents, the collection of Home Accessories and Furniture has a distinct identity of its own. Kifu uses handmade techniques of elaborate inlay patterns of shagreen, shells, semi-precious stones. KIFU embodies whimsical elements throughout her collection and is not afraid to be daring and unexpected in her approach to design. All shagreen-covered items should be kept out of direct sunlight, color variants may occur on the stingray and other exotic finishes, showcasing the Parisian label's commitment to creating authentic luxurious products using natural components.
